content: **tiffany ear warmer + cowl** // a tunisian crochet accessory pair with alternating textured and smooth stitches that mimic knitting worked in color-changing cake yarn get ready to rule this winter when you slip into the tiffany ear warmer and cowl set you ll be shocked at how easy it is to make the cowl practice working tunisian crochet in the round for uninterrupted blissful stitching and the coordinating ear warmer has a cute cinched detail to make even the worst hair days much brighter **materials** -610 yards of ferris wheel yarn 3 skeins - substitute the worsted weight yarn of your choice -5mm crochet hook 6 5mm single ended tunisian crochet hook and 6 5mm double ended tunisian crochet hook at least 6 long -scissors -tapestry needle -locking stitch markers -steam blocking supplies **techniques** -tunisian crochet foundation and bind off -tunisian crochet knit and reverse stitches -single_crochet ribbing -tunisian crochet in the round -steam blocking **sizes** one size - project made with recommended yarn makes an ear warmer that is 20 around x 5 5 tall cowl is 25 around x 17 long find the free version of this project ** here 1 ** // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 https //tlycblog com/tiffany-ear-warmer-cowl-a-free-tunisian-crochet-accessory-duo/
